name: Living in Hell
description: This game was created for a Portfolio Project module for the University course I am attending. In it, I've tried to share some of the story of a character that I had created in the past, and did my best to organise the bits of lore in a way that they are like the slices of a pie, there's simply no correct order in which to eat them. Building the world proved to be a lot more fun than I was expecting, and I hope that whomever experiences it enjoys it too.
